help.description: Muestra la página de ayuda con toda la información de los comandos o de un comando específico.

usage.description: Provee información de todos los comandos del bot.
Provee ayuda e información de un comando en específico.

cmdNotFound.title: Un error ocurió al ejecutar este comando.
cmdNotFound.description: Ninguna información encontrada sobre este comando:

embed.title: Comando Ayuda Yono
embed.description:
{EMOJI_INFO} **Yono** bot es un bot multipropósito hecho para todo el mundo, Yono (Solo necsitas uno). ¿Necesitas ayuda? este enlace podría ayudarte:

{EMOJI_CHROME} Ayuda Web: [Página Web](https://yonobot.co.uk) | [FAQ](https://yonobot.co.uk/faq)

{EMOJI_SUPPORT}  Si estos enlaces no son de mucha ayuda siéntente libre de unirte a nuestra comunidad de discord y servidor de soporte. [Servidor de Discord](https://discord.gg/9BysjJweDt)

 > Administración/Moderación: `ban`, `unban`, `kick`, `purge`, `lock`, `unlock`, `mute`, `unmute`, `addrole`, `removerole`, `autorole`, `urlprot`

 > Información/Utilidad: `help`, `ping`, `say`, `avatar`, `addemoji`, `weather`, `remind`, `support`, `autoping`

> Fun/Images: `binary`, `iq`, `cylde`, `meme`, `joke`, `advice`, `8ball`, `coinflip`, `dice`, `facepalm`, `eject`, `tweet`

> Sorteos/Gestor Invitaciones: `create`, `reroll`, `end`, `list`

embed.title: Métodos de Ayuda de Yono
embed.description: ¿Necesitas ayuda? revisa nuestro servidor de ayuda o nuestra página web para ayuda:

eightball.description: Este comando tiene 8 respuestas posibles como si, no, etc..

usage.description: Tira la bola 8 y sacará una respuesta aleatoria.

responses: Las señales apuntan a que si.
Tengo una perspectiva no muy buena

embed.title: Mi Respuesta Es:
embed.description: > ||Este commando es solo una broma, por favor no te lo tomes en serio||

usage.description: Porvee un consejo de una avanzada IA
Cambia el 'hola mundo' a binario. (Binario: e.g. 0101010)

> `.remind 2h arreglar bugs

provdeOption.title: Avaliable Autorole Options

To set autorole, you need to give a few information, such as the role that should be given.
> .autorole < On/Off> [ Role Name (Mandotory if On)]

Select the buttons below to reset the config settings.

If the button is grey, it means the setting has been reset or the setting wasn't configured.
embed.footer: Please note that once you press the button, the action is irreverseable.

Correct usage: `.setbonus [ user ] [ number ]`

setjoinmessage.description: Set the message to greet the member when they join the server

usage.description: Provides embed setup, if embed was selected
Sets a normal message welcome.

embed.title: This is a title
embed.description:
This is a description.

Use the buttons below to configure this embed.

objects.one: Type the text that will be added to the author title
objects.two: Type the link that will be added to the author icon
objects.three: Type the text that will be added to the title
objects.four: Type the link that will be added to thumbnail
objects.five: Type the text that will be added to the description
objects.six: Type the color to be added at the side of the embed.
objects.seven: Type the text that will be added to the file
objects.eight: Type the text that will be added to the footer text
objects.nine: Type the link that will be added to the footer icon

setjoinmessage.256CharMax: Please enter text shorter than 256 characters.
setjoinmessage.3000CharMax: Please enter text shorter than 3000 characters.
setjoinmessage.authorImgHasToBeLink: Author image has to be a link.
setjoinmessage.invalidColor: Invalid color, please include the color name or hex code, e.g. WHITE or #ffffff
setjoinmessage.invalidSyntax: Invalid syntax. You need a field name AND a field value. Please try again and seperate them using ` -f `. Example: `This is a field title -f This is a field value`
setjoinmessage.fieldMaxMin: The field name has to be less than 256 characters, the field description has to be less than 1000 characters
setjoinmessage.footerImgHasToBeLink: Footer icon has to be a link.
setjoinmessage.thumbnailImgHastoBeLink: Thumbnail has to be a link.
setjoinmessage.cancelled_RerunPopupOne: The embed builder has been cancelled, to rerun type:
setjoinmessage.buttonError: These buttons only apply to the person who ran the command.
setjoinmessage.variablesMsg: Use the variables below in a `/variable-name/` form when writing your text.
setjoinmessage.variables:
```inviter-id - Provides the ID of the inviter` 
 `inviter-tag - Gives the user's tag e.g. Moonlightt#2222` 
 `inviter-mention - Mentions the user that joined` 
 `inviter-invites-total - Provides the total invites for the inviter` 
 `inviter-invites-joins - Provides the joins for the inviter` 
 `inviter-invites-leaves - Provides the leaves for the inviter` 
 `inviter-invites-bonus - Provides the bonus for the inviter` 
 `user-id - Provides the ID of the user that joined` 
 `user-tag - Gives the user's tag e.g. Moonlightt#2222` 
 `user-mention - Mentions the user that joined` 
 `user-created-date - The creation date of the user that joined` 
 `user-joined-date - The date that the user joined the server in` 
 `invite-code - The invite code used to join` 
 `invite-channel - The channel the invite code was created in` 
 `invite-uses - The invite code uses` 
 `guild-name - The guild name` 
 `guild-membercount - The guild total membercount` 
 `user-av - The avatar of the user that joined` 
 `guild-av - The avatar of the guild` 
 `inviter-av - The avatar of the inviter```
setjoinmessage.tooLongToRespond: You took too long to respond, the embed builder has been cancelled.
setjoinmessage.option: Do you want this to be an embed or a normal message - [`embed` / `normal`]
setjoinmessage.1000CharMax: Please provide text less than 1000 characters.
setjoinmessage.set: The embed has been set up, and will be sent when a user leaves.

create.description: Creates a giveaway in the server

create.minimiumTime: The minimum giveaway time is 1 minute, and the maximum is 14 days
create.channelNotFound: Channel not found, please try again.
create.notTextChannel: The channel you provided is not a text channel, please make sure its a text channel.
create.prizeMsgTooLong: Prize message is too long, please decrease the prize message.
